pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 22, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, July 22, 2016:

Ontario

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Dock Innovators Retreat.

Closed to media.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
